Verses: 1 ungalukku Munbaaga Irukkumpodhu Thaazhmaiyaayum, Dhooraththile Irukkumpodhu Ungalmel Kandippaayumirukkira Pavulaagiya Naan Kiristhuvin Saandhaththaiyum Thayavaiyum Munnittu Ungalukkup Puththisollugiren.

2 engalai Maamsaththinpadi Nadakkiravargal Endru Ennugira Silaraikkuriththu Naan Kandippaayirukkavendumendru Ninaiththirukkira Thairiyaththode, Ungalmunpaaga Irukkumpodhu, Naan Kandippullavanaayiraadhapadikku Neengal Echcharikkaiyaayirukka Ungalai Vendikkollugiren.
4 engaludaiya Poraayudhangal Maamsaththukketravaigalaayiraamal, Arangalai Nirmoolamaakkugiradharku Dhevabalamullavaigalaayirukkiradhu.

5 avaigalaal Naangal Tharkkangalaiyum, Dhevanai Arigira Arivukku Virodhamaai Ezhumpugira Ellaa Mettimaiyaiyum Nirmoolamaakki, Endha Ennaththaiyum Kiristhuvukkuk Keezhppadiya Siraippaduththugiravargalaayirukkirom.
6 ungal Keezhppadidhal Niraiverumpodhu, Ellaak Keezhppadiyaamaikkunthakka Needhiyulla Thandanaiyai Seluththa Aayaththamaayumirukkirom.

7 veliththotraththinpadi Paarkkireergalaa? Oruvan Thannaik Kiristhuvukkuriyavanendru Nambinaal, Thaan Kiristhuvukkuriyavanaayirukkiradhupola Naangalum Kiristhuvukkuriyavargalendru Avan Thanniledhaane Sindhikkakkadavan.

8 melum, Ungalai Nirmoolamaakkugiradharkalla, Ungalai Oondrak Kattugiradharkuk Karththarengalukkuk Koduththa Adhigaaraththaikkuriththu, Naan Innum Satre Adhigamaai Menmaipaaraattinaalum Naan Vetkappaduvadhillai.
9 naan Nirubangalaale Ungalaip Bayamuruththugiravanaaith Thondraadhapadikku Idhai Sollugiren.
10 avanudaiya Nirubangal Baarayosanaiyum Balamumullavaigal; Sareeraththin Thotramo Balaveenamum, Vasanam Arpamumaayirukkiradhengiraargale.

11 appadi Sollugiravan, Naangal Thooraththilirukkumpodhu Ezhudhugira Nirubangalaal Vasanaththil Eppadippattavargalaayirukkiromo, Appadippattavargalaagave Sameebaththilirukkumpodhum Kiriyaiyilum Iruppom Endru Sindhikkakkadavan.

12 aagilum Thangalaiththaangale Mechchikkollugira Silarukku Naangal Engalai Sariyaakkavum Oppidavum Thuniyamaattom; Thangalaikkondu Thangalai Alandhukondu, Thangalukke Thangalai Oppittukkollugira Avargal Buththimaangalalla.
13 naangal Alavukku Minji Menmaipaaraattaamal, Ungalidamvaraikkum Vandhettaththakkadhaaga, Dhevan Engalukku Alandhu Pagirndha Alavuppiramaanaththinpadiye Menmaipaaraattugirom.
14 ungalidaththil Vandhettaadhavargalaai Naangal Alavukku Minjippogiradhillai; Naangal Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu Ungalidamvaraikkum Vandhome.
15 engal Alavaik Kadandhu Matravargaludaiya Velaikkutpattu Menmaipaaraattamaattom.

16 aagilum Ungal Visuvaasam Viruththiyaagumpodhu, Matravargaludaiya Ellaigalukkulle Seyyappattavaigalai Naangal Seydhadhaaga Menmaipaaraattaamal, Ungalukku Appuramaana Idangalil Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkaththakkadhaaga, Engal Alavinpadi Ungalaal Migavumperugi Viruththiyadaivomendru Nambikkaiyaayirukkirom.
18 thannaiththaan Pugazhugiravan Uththamanalla, Karththaraal Pugazhappadugiravane Uththaman.
